chara.textHome: Who am I? I couldn't really say.

Well, if I had to say, I'm not anyone
in particular. You know, a person
who isn't anyone. Get it? ...Ahaha!
I just said whatever! Huh?
You actually wanna know about me?
Well, if I had to say...

Wait, are you gettin' deja vu?
Hahaha!

Don't ya just hate it when someone
cleans your room?!

I mean, come on, I put all this
thought into messin' it up!
...Well, I guess I don't THINK about it!
Ahaha!

I think I made a big enough mess,
now I wanna make it all nice and neat.

And then I'll mess it up again...
Heh heh...
Back and forth like that... Hehehe!
Ahh aha...hahaha... Becomin' stronger...
It feels great, don't it?

Hmph! Hmmmph!
Everything in my head is all messed up.
I love it!

I was totally shocked when
I became a Magical Girl.

But at the same time, like,
it was SUPER exciting...
Like I discovered a new world!

I was bad at usin' magic at first.
Made it REAL hard to fight Witches.

But bit by bit, more and more
I got used to it, and now
I get a rush from it...
Ahh, it's great!
This world is incredible!
All right, we're startin' again...

So, what's on for today?
I'll tell ya up-front, don't even
think about anythin' borin'.
We gotta have some fun... Ahaha!
*Snooze* *Snore*
Got ya! I'm awake!
Hahaha!
...Come on, don't make that face!
I was waitin' a whole hour to do that!
Hey, it's lunch, have some of this!
And this!
There's also...this!
And this, and this, and this!
...Huh? Is my lunch gone now?
Hmmm? Ahaha!
Whooo are you! Me?
Wha? My name? I HAVE to say?
...Sure, no problem.

Ah hah hah!
...Hanna Sarasa. Got it?
Sunset... Ahaha...
I know the most beautiful place to watch it.
Heh... Heh heh heh...
It looks so amazing there...

Hey, hey, it's best not to peek
into dark places.
If you look too much...
you'll be sucked into the darkness...
Ah hah hah hah!

I don't care if it's good or bad.
It's about whether it's fun or borin'!
Borin' is, ya know, boring?

So let's spend the day doin'
stuff that's not boring!
Hmmm...
Looks interestin', huh?

Right, let's go.
Right now.
If we don't, I might change my mind.
Hahaha!
I don't really care who I'm with...
I just don't like bein' bored.

We should laugh about everythin',
forget the consequences!
â€™Till the very eeend!

Animals are cool, huh.
I like 'em, really like 'em.
They're not like people.
Huh? People are animals, too?
Well, then they're the only animals I hate.
Ahaha!

Don't run from things.
SMASH right into 'em!
Do that and...you get a mess... Ahaha!
That's one way to end things!

The rush of usin' all your magic
to take out a Witch!

It feels great, like jumpin' off
the roof of a buildin'!
Really gets me goin'!

Are ya a dog person
or a cat person, they say...
Both are cute! Me?
...Were you listenin'?
Like I said...
I'm a dog person.
Hey, you like what you like!

Worryin' about what others
think is a waste of time.

Missin' out on somethin' fun
'cause of that is totally idiotic.
A complete waste.
The way to pet an animal's like this.
Look 'em in the eyes.
Stare at 'em and before long...you'll get bit.

That's a good way to start
a relationship, ain't it?

I don't want to give a damn
about anythin' anymore!

If I just get to do what I want,
when I want, does it really
matter how I end up?
Other Magical Girls?

Yeeeah, they interest me!
If I could meet any, ya think
they'd be friends with me?
Haha... Ahahahaha!
Uh, no, it's fine... I'm okay...
Yep... Don't worry about me... Sorry...
That's exactly how I used to be! Ahaha!

I wouldn't mind if you
approached me, y'know.
Wha? It's already over?
Huuuh, this wound up pretty nice!
I wanna have fun with the next one, too!
This feeling... Ah ha ha!
Yep, uh huh, this is pretty sweet!
Not bad at all!

Whoooa...
So this is how it works...

Hahaha!
Might be fun!

Let's just say this is how things go.
Nothin' wrong with that, right?
I can't relax in a clean room...
So I mess it all up like this, woo! Yeah!
Ahaha! There, now I can relax!
